text: Stories are very important because they can be used to pass down knowledge to younger generations. Stories might contain a message or moral that can positively impact your life if followed. An example of this is the story The Animal People Choose a Leader. This story tells the importance of having many all of the seven grandfather teachings. Stories can also be used to tell history. I learned of my family's past through the stories that my parents have told me. My family has a long history that has been passed down through stories, and this is also how many Indigenous comunities share events of the past (West Coast Family Centers, paragraph 1).
